title: Samorost2 (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Run "setup_samorost2_2.0.0.2"
2. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: SAMOROST2
Genre: Adventure - Point-and-click - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Text only: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: December 10, 2009
Size: 27.2 MB
Company: Amanita Design / Amanita Design
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/samorost2

About:
Samorost2, the sequel to free browser based game Samorost1 is a short point-and-click adventure in which you must help out a little space gnome as he searches for his dog, which has been taken away by aliens.
An adventure full of surprising creatures and locations.
Beautiful ambient music by Tomas "Floex" Dvorak.
Relaxing and peaceful game with intuitive gameplay accessible even for non-experienced players of all ages.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: 1GHz
Memory: 256MB
Graphics: No special requirements
Hard Drive: 30MB
Sound: No special requirements
